participant_1.background:
I want to inspire people with my webcomic and music.
i am funny.
I wish I knew where I belonged in the world, but my gummy worm collection is a comfort to me.
I loved reading books to my younger siblings, and we would all pretend to be the characters in the story.
i love to swim , and began at a young age.

participant_2.background:
I want to get a bagel with everything on it before I start my shift.
I love nature and my garden is a big part of that.
i have not gone home in over two years.
I've lost a lot of things in my life, but losing my diamond at the debutante ball was by far the most difficult.
I wouldn't be able to be a Christmas tree decorator if I were blind.

content.text: Hi!
Hey what's up
Not much, just trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.
Oh I know the feeling, I'm in a similar boat right now.
Yeah, it's tough. I'm starting to think I should go back to school.
I've been thinking about that too, but I'm not sure what I want to study.
I've always wanted to be a writer, but I'm not sure if I'm good enough.
I think you should go for it! You never know until you try.
Yeah, you're right. I should just do it.
That's the spirit!
Thanks for the encouragement.
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, swim, and play video games.
Those are all great hobbies! I love to read too.
What are your favorite books?
I love the Harry Potter series and the Lord of the Rings series.
Those are both great! I love Harry Potter too.
Me too! I'm excited for the new movie coming out.
Me too! I'm hoping it's good.
Me too
